name: Association européenne des transformateurs de maïs doux
memberOrga:
ADEPALE (French Association); AGROSPRINT; AIIPA (Italian Association); ANTARCTIC FOODS AQUITAINE; ARDO; BONDUELLE; BONFREEZE ; CECAB d'Aucy ; CONSERVES France; CONSERVE ITALIA ; DAF; DAWTONA ; FEVITA ; GLOBUS ; MIRELITE MIRSA Zrt. 
NAGYATADI KONZERV / Schenk és Tsa ; PENTAFROST; PINGUIN; PUSZTAKONZERV; SERETRAM GEANT VERT; SZATMAR KONZERV; HUTO ( Hungarian sweet corn association)
goal: The objective of the Association is to represent and promote the common interests of the community of European sweet corn processing industries (canned and frozen).
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
- Trade Policy
- Promotion Policy
- Common Agricultural Policy
- Health and Consumer Affairs
